84884.summary: Some customers in Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84884.title: Nov 24 - Fort McMurray | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

84894.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84894.title: Nov 24 - Calgary (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
